name: Carrot Almond Cranberry Muffin Top Cookies
description: Made these Muffin top cookies a while back. These muffin tops are just that.. Moist and soft and perfect muffin tops without the bottom! They look like crisp cookies , but when you bite into them, they will melt in your mouth
recipeIngredient: 3 Tablespoons raw granulated sugar (1 Tablespoon more if you like your muffin tops sweeter)
1/8 tsp cardamom or other spices of choice
1/4 cup all purpose flour or finely ground oat flour

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the carrots with a 1/4 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the carrots with a 1/4 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the coconut oil, carrots and almond flour and cook on low for 5-7 minutes until the puree or the mass starts to pull away from the sides.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add the coconut oil, carrots and almond flour and cook on low for 5-7 minutes until the puree or the mass starts to pull away from the sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool for a minute and add flaxmeal, vinegar, spices. salt, sugar and canola oil and mix well. Let the mix cool to atleast lukewarm.
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool for a minute and add flaxmeal, vinegar, spices. salt, sugar and canola oil and mix well. Let the mix cool to atleast lukewarm.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the flours and baking powder together in a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk the flours and baking powder together in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours and cranberries and mix till just about combined. Add more flour to get a dryish muffin batter/sticky dough but not stiff.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flours and cranberries and mix till just about combined. Add more flour to get a dryish muffin batter/sticky dough but not stiff.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands and make somewhat ball shapes and pat slightly on parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands and make somewhat ball shapes and pat slightly on parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 14-16 minutes at preheated 350 degrees F , until the center is not runny.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 14-16 minutes at preheated 350 degrees F , until the center is not runny.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool on rack for 2 minutes. Finish them up within 2 days if on counter top.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool on rack for 2 minutes. Finish them up within 2 days if on counter top.
